resources.string: You can use this as to straight enable the SafeCharge Service.
Say goodbye to unnecessary wear and tear on your battery and hello to a longer-lasting, battery ðŸ‘‹.\n\nYour
will alert you when it charges beyond 85%.

For optimized battery life, your phone should never go below 20 percent or never above 85 percent.

It may put your mind at ease when your smartphoneâ€™s battery reads 100 percent charge, but itâ€™s actually not ideal for the battery.

So, if you are keen on keeping your battery living as long as possible, you should keep its charge between 20 and 85 per cent.

This is exactly what SafeCharge serves, it plays an alert tone right when your phone has just went above 85%, alerting you to disconnect the charger.
